title: Barn
description: Wood (350) Stone (150), Houses 4 barn-dwelling animals.

title: Big Barn
description: Wood (450) Stone (200), Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Allows animals to give birth. Unlocks goats.

title: Deluxe Barn
description: Wood (550) Stone (300), Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks sheep and pigs.

title: Coop
description: Wood (300) Stone (100), Houses 4 coop-dwelling animals.

title: Big Coop
description: Wood (400) Stone (150), Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an incubator. Unlocks ducks.

title: Deluxe Coop
description: Wood (500) Stone (200), Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Comes with an auto-feed system. Unlocks rabbits.

title: Fish Pond
description: Stone (200) Seaweed (5) Green Algae (5), Raise fish and harvest their produce. Fish multiply over time.

title: Mill
description: Stone (50) Wood (150) Cloth (4), Allows you to create flour from wheat and sugar from beets.

title: Shed
description: Wood (300), An empty building. Fill it with whatever you like! The interior can be decorated.

title: Big Shed
description: Wood (550) Stone (300), Doubles the size of the shed. The interior can be decorated.

title: Silo
description: Stone (100) Clay (10) Copper Bar (5), Allows you to cut and store grass for feed.

title: Slime Hutch
description: Stone (500) Refined Quartz (10) Iridium Bar (1), Raise up to 20 slimes. Fill water troughs and slimes will create slime balls.
tags: Stone, Refined Quartz, Iridium Bar, Slimes

title: Stable
description: Hardwood (100) Iron Bar (5), Allows you to keep and ride a horse. Horse included.

title: Well
description: Stone (75), Provides a place for you to refill your watering can.

title: Stone Cabin
description: Stone (10), A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Plank Cabin
description: Wood (5) Fiber (10), A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Log Cabin
description: Wood (10), A home for a friend! Subsidized by the town agricultural fund.

title: Shipping Bin
description: Wood (150), Throw items inside to sell them overnight.

title: Mayonnaise Machine
description: Wood (15) Stone (15) Earth Crystal (1) Copper Bar (1), Turns eggs into mayonnaise.
tags: Wood, Stone, Earth Crystal, Copper Bar

title: Bee House
description: Wood (40) Coal (8) Iron Bar (1) Maple Syrup (1), Place outside and wait for delicious honey! (Except in Winter).
tags: Wood, Coal, Iron Bar, Maple Syrup

title: Preserves Jar
description: Wood (50) Stone (40) Coal (8), Turns vegetables into pickles and fruit into jam.

title: Cheese Press
description: Wood (45) Stone (45) Hardwood (10) Copper Bar (1), Turns milk into cheese.

title: Loom
description: Wood (60) Fiber (30) Pine Tar (1), Turns raw wool into fine cloth.

title: Keg
description: Wood (30) Copper Bar (1) Iron Bar (1) Oak Resin (1), Place a fruit or vegetable in here. Eventually it will turn into a beverage.
tags: Wood, Copper Bar, Iron Bar, Oak Resin

title: Oil Maker
description: Slime (50) Hardwood (20) Gold Bar (1), Makes gourmet truffle oil.

title: Cask
description: Wood (20) Hardwood (1), Use in the cellar to age products like wine and cheese.
